entries.name: ID
entries.info: ID

entries.name: fittingMethod
entries.info: fitting method (1 for global fit, 2 for Kalman Filter)

entries.name: c_x
entries.info: x-coordinate of a helical trk point extrapolated to a cylinder at 25 cm radius from the lab origin (cm unit)

entries.name: c_y
entries.info: y-coordinate of a helical trk point extrapolated to a cylinder at 25 cm radius from the lab origin (cm unit)

entries.name: c_z
entries.info: z-coordinate of a helical trk point extrapolated to a cylinder at 25 cm radius from the lab origin (cm unit)b

entries.name: c_ux
entries.info: x-coordinate of a helical trk direction extrapolated to a cylinder at 25 cm radius from the lab origin (cm unit)

entries.name: c_uy
entries.info: y-coordinate of a helical trk direction extrapolated to a cylinder at 25 cm radius from the lab origin (cm unit)

entries.name: c_uz
entries.info: z-coordinate of a helical trk direction extrapolated to a cylinder at 25 cm radius from the lab origin (cm unit)

entries.name: pathlength
entries.info: total pathlength from the origin to the reference point (in cm)

entries.name: q
entries.info: charge

entries.name: p
entries.info: total momentum

entries.name: pt
entries.info: transverse momentum

entries.name: phi0
entries.info: helical track fit parameter: phi at DOCA

entries.name: tandip
entries.info: helical track fit parameter: dip angle

entries.name: z0
entries.info: helical track fit parameter: value of z at the DOCA

entries.name: d0
entries.info: helical track fit parameter: Distance of Closest Approach

entries.name: cov_d02
entries.info: helical track fit covariance matrix element : delta_d0^2

entries.name: cov_d0phi0
entries.info: helical track fit covariance matrix element : delta_d0.delta_phi0

entries.name: cov_d0rho
entries.info: helical track fit covariance matrix element : delta_d0.delta_rho

entries.name: cov_phi02
entries.info: helical track fit covariance matrix element : delta_phi0^2

entries.name: cov_phi0rho
entries.info: helical track fit covariance matrix element : delta_phi0.delta_rho

entries.name: cov_rho2
entries.info: helical track fit covariance matrix element : delta_rho.delta_rho

entries.name: cov_z02
entries.info: helical track fit covariance matrix element : delta_z0^2

entries.name: cov_tandip2
entries.info: helical track fit covariance matrix element : delta_tandip^2

entries.name: circlefit_chi2_per_ndf
entries.info: Circle Fit chi^2/ndf

entries.name: linefit_chi2_per_ndf
entries.info: Line Fit chi^2/ndf

entries.info: Fit chi^2
